description:
SecuStore enables you to safely store sensitve data like pins, credit card numbers and varius passwords on your webOS device. It allows you to organize your data into sets that are encrypted and stored indiviually and that can each be accessed with a single master password.

SecuStore uses the blowfish cipher in combination with the sha-256 and sha-1 hash algorithms to store your data in a secure fashion.

It also offers various features that will help you enormously to manage and maintain your data:

    * The build in password generator makes comeing up with new, strong passwords easy.

    * The Auto Insert feature allows you to conveniently access your online accounts by only a few taps!

    * Prevent data loss by backing up your sets or transfer your data between devices.

    * Store any kind of data by creating your own customized templates! (full version only)

    * Import data from other apps using SecuStore ability to import any kind of csv file! (full version only)

    * Let SecuStore remind you whenever one of your passwords has expired after a lifespan that you determine!

    * Use the gesture lock to protect your passwords while the card is minimized.

    * Synchronize your data with SecuStore for PC & Mac (full version only)


SecuStore is supported by Save/Restore from webOS internals which makes for a very easy backup procedure. Check out Save/Restore via Preware!
